text: Vladimir Naumovich Naumov (; 6 December 1927 â€“ 29 November 2021) was a Russian director and writer. His 1981 movie Teheran 43 won the Golden Prize at the 12th Moscow International Film Festival. Naumov died on 29 November 2021 in Moscow at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian movie directors Category:Russian screenwriters
title: Vladimir Naumov
